statements: SELECT * FROM return_rates_analysis;
SELECT return_date, return_reason, satisfaction_rating FROM return_rates_analysis;
SELECT product_id, return_reason, customer_id FROM return_rates_analysis WHERE satisfaction_rating > 3;
SELECT customer_id, return_date FROM return_rates_analysis ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT return_id, return_reason, satisfaction_rating FROM return_rates_analysis WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM return_rates_analysis WHERE satisfaction_rating > 4 ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, return_reason, COUNT(*) as total_returns FROM return_rates_analysis GROUP BY product_id, return_reason;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(satisfaction_rating) as avg_rating FROM return_rates_analysis GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(satisfaction_rating) < 3;
SELECT return_id, product_id, return_reason, customer_id FROM return_rates_analysis WHERE return_reason LIKE '%defective%' ORDER BY return_date ASC;
SELECT MAX(satisfaction_rating) as highest_rating, MIN(satisfaction_rating) as lowest_rating, AVG(satisfaction_rating) as avg_rating FROM return_rates_analysis;
SELECT * FROM returns WHERE return_reason = 'Defective'
SELECT product_id, product_name, category FROM products
SELECT AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM products
SELECT * FROM returns WHERE customer_id = 100 AND return_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics'
SELECT * FROM returns WHERE return_reason LIKE 'Damaged%' ORDER BY return_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE avg_return_rate > 0.1 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT return_date, customer_id, product_id FROM returns WHERE return_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY return_date DESC, customer_id ASC;
SELECT category, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM products GROUP BY category HAVING COUNT(product_id) > 1 ORDER BY total_products DESC;
SELECT return_id, product_name, return_reason FROM returns JOIN products ON returns.product_id = products.product_id WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY return_id ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customers;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products WHERE price < 100;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT return_date, return_reason FROM Returns ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM Products WHERE stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY stock_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM Returns WHERE return_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, return_date, return_reason FROM Returns WHERE customer_id = 1001 ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number, address FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 5002;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50 AND stock_quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, return_reason FROM products WHERE return_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, return_date, return_reason FROM returns WHERE return_reason LIKE '%defective%' ORDER BY return_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, feedback_date, stars FROM feedback WHERE stars >= 4 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM products
SELECT product_name, return_date FROM products WHERE product_id = 1
SELECT customers.customer_name, returns.return_date FROM customers INNER JOIN returns ON customers.customer_id = returns.customer_id
SELECT product_name, return_reason FROM products WHERE return_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT feedback_text, stars FROM feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50.00 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount, status FROM Orders WHERE status = 'In Progress';
SELECT * FROM ReturnsHistory WHERE resolution IS NULL ORDER BY return_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Returns WHERE return_id = 1
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT order_id, total_amount, status FROM Orders WHERE status = 'Shipped' AND total_amount > 100 ORDER BY total_amount ASC
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT return_id, customer_id, order_id, return_date FROM ReturnsHistory WHERE resolution = 'Refunded' ORDER BY return_date DESC
